title: Playbook - In Progress
description: Playbook is a web application that allows gamers to connect, share, and discover new games. Using the IGDB API, Playbook provides users with access to detailed information about games, including reviews, ratings, and gameplay footage. Users can create a profile, follow other gamers, and comment and like games they've played. With a sleek and modern dark mode design, Playbook is the ultimate destination for gamers looking to explore the world of gaming and connect with like-minded individuals.

title: Tuiter
description: I'm making a twitter clone as a learning project

title: Secure Chat App
description: A console based end-to-end encrypted chat application with self-designed authentication protocols entirely functioning using UDP.

title: RSA AES-CBC Hybrid Encryption
description: An implementation of a hybrid encryption system involving RSA, and AES256-CBC
